message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SI, cs.CC, cs.NI, cs.SY 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - This paper deals with polar codes, which are a popular topic in information theory. 
2. cs.SI (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses convergence rates and error exponents, which are relevant to control systems. 
3. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper may involve computational complexity in the implementation of the multi-kernel construction. 
4. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - Polar codes are used in various communication systems, making this paper relevant to networking and internet architecture. 
5. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper's focus on convergence rates and error exponents may also make it relevant to the systems and control sub-category.
